content: Fix the login error - users can't sign in
I'll check the auth middleware. Let me inspect the authentication flow.
It's showing 'Invalid credentials' even with correct password
Found the issue - password comparison was using wrong hash algorithm. Fixed by updating bcrypt.compare() to use the correct salt rounds.
Can you add a dark mode toggle to the admin panel?
I'll add a theme toggle in the admin header. Creating the toggle component now.
Looks good! Make sure it persists across page refreshes
Added localStorage persistence for theme preference. The theme will now persist across sessions.
